scripts.font:clone: npm run font:delete && cd VITE_FONT && git clone https://github.com/Eug620/vite.git && cd vite && yarn && yarn build
scripts.font:update: npm run font:delete && cd VITE_FONT/ && cd vite/ && git pull && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:first: npm run font:mkdir && npm run font:clone && npm run font:copy && npm run forever:pru
scripts.build:update: npm run public:delete && npm run font:update && npm run font:copy && npm run forever:pru
